section.title: Ingestion Deltas
section.para: Deltas are records that are not processed by an ingestion job because the data already exists in the database (the ingestion of the data would not change the values stored in the database).
When deltas occur, &PRODUCTABBR; records them in the main log file associated with the ingestion job. The deltas appear in the following format:
section.programlisting: INFO <number of deltas detected per resource>
